jobs.title: Growth Hacker / Marketer
jobs.description:
We are a sustainable clothing startup looking for a  predominantly remote Growth Marketer (Growth Hacker, etc.) with a proven track record of delivering increased ROAS, CTR, and ultimately revenue.

We are launching new lines in the next quarter, and need someone to help drive high-converting traffic to our site.

We imagine these channels will be most successful:
- Facebook and Instagram ads
- Pinterest ads
- Google shopping ads
- Google search ads
... but your ideas and creativity are very-much welcomed.

We run on Shopify, so you should have a good understanding of the platform. 

Please provide concrete examples of past success when applying to this role.

*Remuneration*: Please note, the salary attached to this listing is somewhat arbitrary. The arrangement is TBC, and may take on any of the following forms: consultancy, freelance, contract.
